name: Cyan's Snow House
description: "Your place is here." - "Cyan's Snow House" is a dialogue-free, short indie game set in a snowy village, offering a universal, heartwarming experience in just 10 minutes. Enjoy tranquil moments with Cyan and her animal friends, leaving a lasting impression.

name: Astro Chef
description: Dive into Astro Chef, a VR culinary adventure like no other! Serve exotic dishes to unique alien customers and rebuild the restaurant's reputation. Master alien ingredients, tackle cosmic puzzles, and experience the thrill of VR cooking solo or in co-op mode.

name: Sphinx: Riddles of the Nile
description: Discover the secrets of the Nile and solve over 500 fascinating puzzles in the magical world of ancient Egypt

name: Slot Fever
description: Slot Fever is the new and realistic slot game on Steam. Play the classic slot, trade your winnings or unlock bonuses. It's fun, addictive and challenging. Download it today and see for yourself!

name: Kottabos VR
description: This is a VR trip into the ancient world - playing Kottabos, the all-time favorite Greek party game. Prove your skill by throwing the dregs of wine from your cup at the metal disk on the pole in front of you, or fling your drops at the little cups floating in a bowl.

name: Good Guys
description: What do your pets do when you're not at home?

name: Think a Little
description: Sin descripción

name: DNF Duel: DLC 4 - Monk
description: 'Monk' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: Ultimate Bicycle Stunts
description: Get ready to experience the ultimate rush in Ultimate Bicycle Stunts!

name: Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection
description:
Fight in iconic battles from across the STAR WARS galaxy!

Play the classic STAR WARS Battlefront games on modern consoles, online and offline in this complete classic collection.

This Classic Collection includes:
STAR WARS Battlefront (Classic)
-Includes Bonus Map: Jabba's Palace
STAR WARS Battlefront II
-Includes Bonus Maps: Bespin: Cloud City, Rhen Var: Harbor, Rhen Var: Citadel, and Yavin 4: Arena
-Includes Bonus Heroes: Asajj Ventress & Kit Fisto

Key Features
Traverse the Galaxy in Campaign Mode & Galactic Conquest
Galactic Conquest: Devise your strategy, recruit your troops, and execute your tactical vision for conquering the galaxy.
STAR WARS Battlefront Campaign: Experience iconic battles from STAR WARS Episodes I-VI
STAR WARS Battlefront II Campaign: Join the rise of Darth Vader’s elite 501st Legion of Stormtroopers

Massive Locations with up to 64-player Online Support
-Fight on the ground: Wookiee Warriors, Jet Troopers, Droidekas and more in massive multiplayer action
-Drive iconic vehicles: Speeder Bikes, AT-STs, AT-RTs, and more in offensive and defensive battles
-Pilot legendary starships: TIE fighters, X-wings, and more in space and air dogfights

Expanded Hero Assault
Hero Assault is playable on all ground maps including: Death Star, Kashyyyk, Kamino, and Naboo for the first time ever
-Fight with heroes: Mace Windu, Yoda, Luke Skywalker, and many others!
-Battle with villains: Darth Maul, General Grievous, Darth Vader, and many others!

name: Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt
description: Lost in a series of endless train station hallways, find your way to the exit Platform in this First-Person Anomaly Spotting game set in the Midnight Monitor universe. Watch out for anomalies - If you see any, turn back immediately! Can you find your way out of Aldercourt Station?

name: The Head Well Lost
description: An otome visual novel about a librarian and a pop star without a head.

name: Wartop
description: Wartop is a virtual tabletop system created specifically for playing tabletop skirmish and war games. Built from the ground up to handle the specific needs of these kinds of games. A focus on visual fidelity and ease of play.

name: Idle Dungeon
description: This is a idle RPG game.In the dungeon, you can encounter various monsters and powerful bosses guarding levels. Only by defeating the boss can you enter the next 10th level. In the boss tower, you can challenge increasingly powerful bosses, obtain various materials, gems, and advanced skill books.

name: Burning Wall
description: The burning wall is behind you and you will not let go, try to reach the exit by showing skill and accumulating wealth.

name: Wildlife Matters
description: Wildlife Matters is a retro puzzle-adventure game. As a young ranger, travel the globe rescuing captured animals. Explore forgotten caves, ancient temples, rare safaris, wild jungles, and stunning waterfalls. Your journey unfolds in a captivating puzzle-solving odyssey!

name: The Rewinder: Root of Evil
description: Sin descripción

name: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs
description: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs is an online multiplayer snake and ladder game with superpowers and lots of mischief! Change the course of the game with various skill cards. Push your enemy to their demise. Really, don't be nice while playing this game.

name: What?!
description: What?! is a single-player mystery game that focuses on its compact story and unconventional solutions. Players will take on the role of Pat Irvin, a ditzy private investigator struggling to maintain his family business.

name: A Step From Insanity
description: A Step From Insanity is a 2D platformer-shooter where you play as a man with many psychological illnesses searching for the end to his insanity. Guided by an unfamiliar friend, search for the mysterious sanity powders told to be able to cure any mental illness.

name: Paint the Town Red VR
description: Paint the Town Red VR is a virtual reality version of the popular first-person melee brawler.

name: Robin Morningwood Adventure: Attack of the Gay Clones
description: Welcome to the "Happy Ending"! A park located on a tropical island where men, orcs, but also woofians like to come to relax... Or at least they used to.

name: Pogo Joins the Circus
description: Pogo Joins The Circus takes the role of the eponymous Pogo Joe, a boy on a pogo stick. Holding the joystick button lets Pogo Joe jump over a barrel or empty space the width of a barrel. Falling off is impossible.

name: Skelethrone: The Prey
description: This game is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls. Skelethrone: The Prey is a free prequel to the main game, setting the stage for the events that will unfold throughout Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona campaign.

name: Macross: Shooting Insight
description: Macross Shooting Insight is an upcoming scrolling shoot'em up based on the mecha multimedia franchise Macross, developed by Kaminari Games and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: Unables
description: Unables is really something else... A brand new comedy game with innovative, arcade gameplay, set in a cartoon world spoiled by extreme laziness. Our cast of classic heroes seem to have their "do nothing" skill maxed out. What to do when characters are so lazy, even you are unable to control them?

name: Nice Disc: The Last Hot Blood
description: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Dino Safari
description: Dino Safari first opened its doors in 1994 to capitalise on the mainstream obsession with all things prehistoric, and is proudly still going strong today. There are four main zones containing eight dinosaurs whose grounds need maintaining… if you’re brave enough!

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Ancient Britain
description: Britain’s finest Ancient sites are in need of a trim! Discover 4 new locations: The Royal Stones, Druid Tor, The Ancient Aurochs and Aurochs Hill. Due to their heritage status, they come with very heavy fines for any damage so be sure to cut carefully!

name: Lazriel the Demon's Fall
description: The angel "Lazriel" was dropped into the demon world. The only way to return to the heavenly world is to go up the tower. Go up the tower before she "fall" to the demon's power, and aim to return alive.

name: Cookie Run: Witch's Castle
description:
Welcome to CookieRun: Witch’s Castle. Get ready to dive into a cute and mysterious puzzle escapade!

Clear dynamic tap-to-blast levels and explore the mysterious and enchanting Witch’s Castle. But watch out! Traces of the witch are everywhere, and dangers lurk around every corner! Team-up with the Cookies to explore and discover the secrets of the Witch’s Castle!

name: Slavania
description: Fantasy metroidvania with a moral choice and hunting the bosses who are not going to patiently wait for you in their lair. Study the monsters. Track'em. Kill'em. Exploration of the vast interconnected fairytale world, an acrobatic combat system and weird locals are what awaits you.

name: Fencing
description: [Fencing] is an unconventional game. Players only use four keys to control the character fight, there will be many unexpected situations in the fight, for example, the character is suddenly hit to fly, or the character suddenly cramps!!!

name: Zofia
description: Zofia is a first person online and/or split screen cooperative RPG. Branded as a heretic and an outcast, you manage to escape the northern empire and take up work as a Seeker.

name: I Can't Trust My Eyes
description: I Can't Trust My Eyes is a short horror game about mental aberrations. Faces of other people started to distort after the accident - terrifying, isn't it? The game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete. Made for Acerola Jam 0 in 2 weeks.

name: Gitadora Galaxy Wave
description: The tenth game in the Gitadora series, a spinoff series of the GuitarFreaks and DrumMania franchises.

name: Revere
description: 'revere' is a psychological found footage horror game where every detail matters. Prepare yourself for an experience where your sanity will be condemned.

name: Trichromat
description: This game was made in 2 weeks for the Acerola Jam 0. It's a puzzle game wher you have to make the withe with the rgb color in boxes and other forms.

name: SM228: Vanilla
description: 18 maps + a start map using good old "vanilla" id progs and id textures!

name: Deathtroopers: The Outpost
description: The story is very simple, but it connects directly with the original: a fleeing soldier ends up crashing into Endor. Here he will find death and a deadly virus, already widespread throughout much of the Outer Rim of the known galaxy. Seeking help, he finds an old resistance outpost, seemingly abandoned. In an attempt to find a means of communication to call for help, he enlists the help of his faithful but damaged droid DD5. Having learned of the events that are happening on the planets around his own, he decides to embark on a fight for survival without any other choice.

name: RealFlight Evolution: 2024 Year Content Pass
description: The RealFlight 2024 Year Content Pass gets you access to all RealFlight DLC for 2024, the moment it is released.

name: 2D Dogfight: Secret Project
description: "2D Dogfight - Secret Project" DLC includes the following 12 Aircrafts: Mitsubishi F-1 F-14D Super Tomcat F-15EX Eagle II F-5E Tiger 2000 Kurnass 2000 IAI Lavi MiG-31BM Foxhound Su-47 Berkut Tejas Mk.1 X-29 X-31 Ye-8

name: Forza Motorsport: 1983 Nissan #23 Nissan Motorsports Silvia Super Silhouette
description: Forza Motorsport 1983 Nissan #23 Nissan Motorsports Silvia Super Silhouette

name: BDSM Sex: Episode 3
description: A visual novel series about a young woman named Katy. In this episode, she returns to her Master’s dungeon, eager to explore new sensations and push her boundaries.

name: Astroneer: Evolution Edition
description: The Astroneer: Evolution Edition bundles the base game and dozens of free updates (Creative Mode, The Xenobiology, Rails, Awakening content updates & more!!!) with the Evolution Pack that includes the exclusive Evolution Suit as well as a bundle of QBITS that you can use to make sure your Astroneer has a unique look as soon as you land on Sylva.

name: Pixel Heroes: Tales of Emond
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life: Escape 2.0
description: A new episode from the Half-Life Universe!

name: Patchouli's Adventure In Doll's House
description: Let's unravel the mysteries of the Doll's House with witch Patchouli! Embark on an adventure in the mysterious and beautiful doll's House, find items, solve puzzles, and find the whereabouts of her beautiful lover - Alice. Experience a relaxed and fun story, and discover the secrets of the witches.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fitness Club
description: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity.

name: Farmer Simulator Evolution: Farming Tractor
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Premium Drive Pass Season 4
description: Purchase the Premium Drive Pass for Season 4 to unlock the ability to earn a total of 84 Premium Rewards at your own pace, including 9 Vehicles, 10 Drivers, and more!

name: Mortal Fight: Lethal Revenge
description: Mortal Fight: Lethal Revenge offers an unforgettable fighting game experience. This epic adventure is filled with a rich story, epic boss battles, and three selectable main characters.

name: Ball Destiny
description: Sin descripción

name: Benjamin's Quest
description: Enter the chilling world of Benjamin's Quest, a top-down shooter by Cryptic Games. Trapped in an eerie dungeon, face off against mysterious creatures to survive. Unearth secrets and strive for safety as you navigate through this nightmare from which you must awaken.

name: Benjamin's Revenge
description: Embark on a daring mission in Benjamin's Revenge, a retro-style puzzle platformer set in the year 2060. As Benjamin, you must navigate through a high-security facility filled with traps and intricate puzzles. Sneak past surveillance cameras, hack security systems, and outsmart your enemies to hijack the top-secret lab and uncover its hidden mysteries. Can you unravel the truth before it's too late? The fate of the future rests in your hands.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019 Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 3
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes BNSF H3, Canadian Pacific, CSX, Milwaukee Road and SLSF (Frisco) locos.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KCVG Airport
description: The airport's code, CVG, is derived the words Cincinnati Vicinity and Greater. Serving commercial passengers since 1947 with more than an area of 7,700 acres (3,100 ha) and offers non-stop passenger service to over 50 destinations in North America and Europe.

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Cars
description: OG Memory: Synthwave Cars is an casual puzzel game with stunning images in the synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 02
description: Experience the challenges of Blue Ridge Mountain railroading and legendary Saluda Grade across two captivating eras - those of the Southern Railway and successor Norfolk Southern - with Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 02!

name: Avoo
description: Avoo is a trivia game for 1-4 players in which players collaborate to repopulate a forest by watering it with their knowledge.

name: Train Valley 2: Patent Pending
description: Ride 20 valleys trains alongside the Flazm Interactive's Delivery Puzzle Ideas Requisition Division, where no expense is spared and jury-rigging new plot devices while accidentally inventing another chewing gum flavor or propulsion system is all just another day at the office.

name: Deceit 2: Werewolf
description: Stalk your prey and hide your true nature as a wolf among sheep with the Wyrtorn Terror. The Werewolf Pack also gives you an exclusive curse, The Chemist, and an exclusive item the Ball & Chain.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Air Tractor 1.5m
description: This is a scale replica of the agricultural "crop dusting" utility aircraft including molded-in panel lines, rivets and more

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Commander mPd 1.4m
description: The E-flite Commander mPd 1.4m now includes the updates and upgrades you want most! It's 3S and 4S compatible, features metal-geared servos and the benefits of Smart technology — making it a perfect everyday sport model for a wide variety of pilots.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite UMX Waco
description: The E-flite UMX WACO blends classic style with state-of-the-art features including a 2S and 3S compatible power system and optional-use SAFE Select to give you one of the most rewarding Golden Age biplane flying experiences at any size!

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Valiant 1.3m
description: The versatile Valiant 1.3m park flyer gives you the inherent stability of a classic high-wing model but with more modern lines and sporty response. You also get functional flaps right out of the box and the option to add floats (sold separately).

name: RealFlight Evolution: Tower Hobbies ASW-28
description: The ASW 28 2.0m electric sailplane is one of the most maneuverable, highest-performance gliders from Tower Hobbies. It is also a high-level product that takes full advantage of accumulated design experience and technical solutions from many years of development.

name: RealFlight Evolution: ViperJet
description: This detailed scale model of the ViperJet has a 3.5m wingspan and is powered by a turbine engine.

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Jungle Assault Pack
description: Weapon skins are cosmetic items grounded in reality that don't impact gameplay.

description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Regis (if you don't already own them) Spelljammer Regis Skin An Epic Feat for Regis 7 Gold Regis Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

description: DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance.

name: Ys X: Nordics - Nosfleet Ship Set
description: DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance.

name: Ys X: Nordics - The Pikkard Set
description: DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance.

name: Inside the Machine
description: A simple yet challenging puzzle game where a soul has lost its body. It has to navigate from machine to machine through various puzzles in search of its real body. Will it reach its goal or be forever lost in a foreign body?

name: DriftCE: Toyota Chaser JZX100
description: The mythic Toyota Chaser JZX100 is available as DLC in DRIFTCE - get into it and burn rubber! Bring your brand-new Toyota to the garage, tune it to increase its performance, and choose your best liveries to make it shine on the track!

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Secret Species Pack
description: Showcase four new bioengineered hybrid dinosaurs in your parks with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Secret Species Pack.

name: Free Girls!
description: Free Girls! - is a stunning, animated, relaxing game where sexy girls are always free and want to fulfill all your fantasies! In this game you will definitely forget about time and find the girl of your dreams!

name: Angler Quest
description: Giant fish and other aquatic animals are top of the food chain! Play as an Angler, a specialized hunter of these great beasts. Fish, craft and battle your way to victory as you move through ranks in the guild and get ever closer to finally beating the dreaded Vermundus, King of the Depths.

name: Logic Town: Country Fair
description: Step right up and experience the all the joys of Spring in Country Fair, the newest DLC for Logic Town! From thrilling rides to mouth-watering snacks, games, and competitions, there's something for everyone to enjoy in this new bumper expansion.

name: Eternal Spring VR
description: Immerse yourself in 'ETERNAL SPRING (長春) VR,' an animated 360 documentary that goes inside the world of a real-life survivor of religious persecution in China, adding a new dimension to the feature film that was Canada's official submission to the 2023 Oscars.

name: Where Safety Ends R
description: What does it take to be SAFE? Maybe it's all about a person who will come to your rescue no matter what. Or maybe it has to do with a place that you know inside and out. OR, perhaps, (just maybe) a room full of strangers with no entrance might just do the trick.

name: Lock n Drop Bracket Racing
description: Racers can Select from multiple cars and race split screen with a friend!

name: Poorzzle: Puzzle Alive
description: Welcome to Poorzzle - Puzzle Alive, a pure speculative puzzle game. Here, simple lines outline the ultimate purity, and 12 crafted puzzles will subvert your way of thinking. Puzzle comes alive when you unlock it.

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Boats
description: OG Memory: Synthwave Boats is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Burning Ass
description: It is a multiplayer platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world full of mysteries, where water is the most valuable resource. If you are an hardcore player, bypass all the traps and be the first to get it! Blood, Gore, Fun!

name: Psalm 5:9-13
description: "Psalm 5:9-13" is a first-person psychological horror game with VHS effect. Be careful and attentive, there is something hiding in these rooms, something is watching from the darkness.

name: Micro Dungeon
description: Turn-based gameplay with roguelike and random elements. What could be better?

name: Loong
description: "LOONG" is a dragon as the theme of the snake game, you will choose different styles of dragon civilization, through the snake to create the dragon totem.

name: Genshin Impact: Blades Weaving Betwixt Brocade
description:
Version 4.5 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Chiori
• New banner type: Chronicled Wish
• New character quest for Chiori
• New hangout event for Lynette
• New main event: Alchemical Ascension
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Turkish Throne
description: Lead your political party in a fierce competition to seize power against major rivals. Invest strategically, secure votes, and navigate crucial decisions to claim the presidential seat. Will you shape the destiny of Turkish politics?

name: Dreamy Duels: Tales of Heroes in Gensoukyo
description: Dreamy Duels is a card game inspired by Touhou project universe and various other classic card games. In this game, you can craft you own cards with card editor, and use them to engage other players in a diverse card game world.

name: ProtectHeart
description: ProtectHeart is a strategic defense game, defend the heart at all costs! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Anominal
description: A 2D platformer with a twist: instant teleportation! Solve brain-scratching puzzles, engage in adrenaline-pumping traversary, and discover the purpose within.

name: Sea under the sea under the sea
description: The year is 2082. Most of the planet is covered with water, and the composition of marine fauna has changed dramatically. Humanity has about 500 million people, most living where mountains used to be.

name: Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story
description: 42 of the weirdest, trippiest, sheepiest games ever created. Enter the mind of Jeff Minter, the legendary creator of Attack of the Mutant Camels, Gridrunner, and Tempest 2000, in this interactive documentary from Digital Eclipse.

name: Krosfighter
description: Who will be the last one standing? Choose your hero from a wide range of universes and play with friends in this party shooter packed with colorful graphics and rogue-like features. It's just plain fun, online or locally, for two to four players.

name: The Order of the Snake Scale
description: Inspired by Lovecraft, a psychological survival horror game set in a dystopian, alternative universe. Discover the mystery of the woman's death and learn the dark secrets of the Happy Rock. Are you ready? Demo available in February 2024.

name: Slime Masters
description: In Slime Masters, defend the town from menacing monsters as a valiant hero. Choose from 5+ unique characters, level up, acquire powers, and embark on quests. Unleash strategic combat and become the legendary Slime Master in this endless adventure of bravery and heroism.

name: Dune: Imperium
description:
In Dune: Imperium, you'll step into the role of one of the leaders of the Great Houses of the Imperium in a struggle to control the planet Arrakis and the invaluable Spice it provides.

The game plays out in a series of ten rounds, each of which is defined by a new Conflict on the surface of the planet; some award critical resources, and some provide Victory Points that will propel you to dominance. But choose your battles wisely: spread your forces too thin, and you'll find your enemies growing too strong to oppose.

Each round, you'll draw a hand of five cards from your deck, which will get stronger over the course of the game as you acquire new cards. Each card can be played in one of two ways: To send an Agent out into the Imperium to gather resources, or to Reveal at the end of the round to purchase new powerful cards. You must maintain a careful balance to get the most of the resources available to you. How will you find your path?

As your game progresses, you'll vie for Influence with four factions of the Imperium: The Emperor, the economically powerful Spacing Guild, the mysterious Bene Gesserit, and the ferocious Fremen of the deep deserts. Earning Influence among the various groups helps you to earn the Victory Points you need...but will you compete with your rivals for their favor, or abandon alliances to pursue other opportunities?

Many strategies are at your disposal, and many paths to victory. The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

name: Lovey-Dovey Lockdown
description: You and your former college crush have been locked in a room through divine intervention. The only way out is for you to…

name: Yubu: The Shoeventure
description: Yubu: The Shoeventure is a 3D platformer where you embark on an extraordinary journey alongside Yubu. In the realm of Yubu, shoes hold the key to unimaginable powers, so why not utilize them to defeat the Reseller?

name: Cybertrash Statyx
description: Cyberthrash Statyx is tactical 2D action-platformer. Run, jump, slide, destroy enemies, gain experience points, upgrade your character - Jenet which trying escape from corporation.

name: A Life of Logic
description:
A Life of Logic (ALOL) is a story-based game built upon an elegant logic puzzle where the objective is to fill a board with two different tiles while satisfying three simple rules. How simple? You'll find out after installing :)
Solve challenging puzzles to unfold a charming story about a life full of memorable milestones. Exercise your brain every day with daily challenges. Battle other players in exciting real-time matches. Compete in global tournaments and become the best solver. Welcome to a new life of logic!

name: Slidemagi
description: Slidemagi is a magical combat between two mages. Each one will use their deck of cards to cast spells or create warriors that will fight under their control. It is a turn-based strategy game with a unique way of moving on an isometric board, playable by one or two players, locally or remotely.

name: Uootoy 3671
description: The legendary comic action puzzle "Uootoy" from 1984 is now available in its ultimate version with all the elements enhanced! The combination of various simple tricks is easy for anyone to understand, and the various stages that stimulate your creativity will keep you hooked!

name: Asonde Mahjong ga Tsuyoku Naru! Ginsei Mahjong DX
description:
Have fun and learn Mahjong!

You can learn the basic rules and how to play in the "Mahjong Classroom," and you can play against 20 unique opponents in the "Game" mode, which has plenty of support features for beginners. Have fun while you get stronger!

name: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Synchrony
description: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Synchrony is a massive new content pack for Crypt of the NecroDancer! It adds online multiplayer (co-op and vs), three new characters, full mod support (and built-in mod portal), new items, enemies, traps, and more!

name: Elemental
description: 'Elemental' is a psychological horror game where every detail matters. Prepare yourself for an experience in which your morals will be tested and your sanity condemned.

name: Echo of Ayllu
description: Assemble a team of 8 characters, choose your victory goals, and join the battlefield to access the Energy Rock's power. Far from traditional TCGs, Echo of Ayllu is a magnificent, original, and explosive card game.

name: War Thunder: Merkava Mk.3 Raam Segol Pack
War Thunder: Type 90B "Fuji" Pack
description:
This pack includes:

Type 90B "Fuji" (Rank 7, Japan)
Premium account for 20 days;
2500 Golden Eagles.

name: War Thunder: F-20A Tigershark Pack
Starlaxy Cats
description:
Save the planet!
Help your cats on their one-way journey to space to protect and save the planet in an action-packed shoot 'em up adventure, featuring various characters, adversaries, and more!

A threat from outer space is approaching, and you will need to utilize different tools and upgrades for your spaceship, piloted by one of your adorable cats. Together, they will do their best to rescue planet Earth.

name: Corpse Carnival
description:
Explore the carnival with your friends! Your little sister is there to tag along as well. Why not play some games, interact with the patrons and have some fun?

...As long as you're home by nightfall...

name: Mario Kart: Double Dash!! Plus
description: A mod for Mario Kart: Double Dash!! that includes 64 new race tracks and 24 battle courses from older and newer Mario Kart games, 200cc, and 4-player Grand Prix.

name: After Doom
description: "After Doom" takes place between Doom II: Hell on Earth and Doom 64,

name: No Limite
description: Something a bit Zelda 2D-like, a bit SNES Goof Troop, but you find/use >many< items, and you pick up items that are of no use to the game either. Confusing point-and-click puzzles made worse by useless items. A jaguar eating a contestant from No Limite.

name: Escape the Chambers
description: Escape ﻿﻿the Chambers its a short mapset for MBF21 that focus on puzzle elements and cryptic progression.

name: Galaxy Ballerina
description: A one-minute short story about sharing the stage.

name: Where are You?
description: You're 7 years old, and you can't find your big sister. Search the house and collect the four parts of her diary, to find out where she is.

name: Play for Love
description: You're a high school student with exceptional athletic abilities who's wanted by all the sports clubs at school. But this year, you don't want to spend your days sweating in the summer heat—instead, you want a relaxing year and a girlfriend. That all goes out the window, however, when you accidentally injure a member of the baseball team, which leads to you subbing in as a replacement. Your outstanding performance ends up attracting the attention of the other team managers, who immediately ask you to join their clubs. You decline their offers, but what will you do when these beautiful managers waste no time in asking you out in return for playing for them?

name: Because of Magic
description: A tower defense game where you equip them with magical abilities.

name: Love Memory Mimic
description: Sin descripción

name: Tank Survivor
description: A battlefield survival game where the enemies are evil creatures from unknown dimensions, but luckily you have a tank! Help the AI ​​troops build camps, recruit new soldiers, and use your tanks to keep everyone alive as long as possible! If possible, destroy the evil creature's portal!

name: Bonk'em
description: A simple "Whack-a-Mole" game for the Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Bal
description: A VR dating simulator with your own adventure playstyle. Gain stats and work to gain coins. You have 30 days to complete as many women as possible.

name: Dead by Daylight: All Things Wicked Chapter
description: Dead by Daylight's All Things Wicked delves into the depths of analog horror with new Killer, The Unknown, and new Survivor, Sable Ward. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Unknown's Garden Casual and Sable Ward's Designer Corset.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Warden Police Vehicle
description: The Warden Police Vehicle features a light bar on top that can display messages for securing accident sites at night, as well as for setting up road blocks or signaling traffic offenders to pull over.

name: China: Mao's Legacy - Ways of Life
description: Push the limits of what you can comfortably expect with this small add-on that gives you unusual possibilities

name: No Love Lost: Founders Pack
description: Incoming -- limited-edition content is up for grabs! Start your raiding journey now to seize your chance and acquire the Founder's Pack before it disappears on March 31st! This special content drop includes 10 weapons, an exhilarating new way to travel and a stylish new accessory for your Raider!

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Emerald Coast Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Emerald Coast Australia. The contents of this pack are cosmetic only.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - High Caliber Weapon Pack
description: Take on the biggest game with the High Caliber Weapon Pack. This package contains three top-grade weapons crafted for pure firepower and maximum range as well as five new cosmetics.

name: Left Behind
description: Left Behind is a hyper-realistic psychological horror game where you take on the role of a real estate agent with a client looking to sell you a property. Instead of a straightforward and quick interaction with the client, you find yourself thrust into a deeply unsettling and frightening situation.

name: Multicrash!
description: Push your limits in Multicrash! by selecting when to dodge and when to crash while picking up coins along the way. Survive as long as possible in this simple, but challenging, retro-arcade game. See how you compare with others on the global leaderboard.

name: Always 1-1
description: Search for "anomalies" in a 2D platformer

name: Night Crows
description: In 13th-century Europe, where magic still exists, we created a new world in which fantasy meets reality. Night versus day, light versus darkness, order versus chaos, and oppression versus rebellion— everything clashes and collides in the lands of medieval Europe. Dive into the most realistic experience of the European continent, brought to life with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Meow Moments: Valentine's Day
description: Experience love in every corner! Join our feline friends and diverse characters in a charming Valentine's Day garden. Engage in heartwarming activities, from picnics to romantic serenades, in this delightful DLC for Meow Moments: Celebrating Together.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass
description: Dive deeper into the world of Persona 3 Reload with this expansion pass featuring new costumes, BGM, and extended story content Episode Aigis -The Answer-.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set
description:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 5 Royal.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs "Life Will Change", "Beneath the Mask", "Kichijoji 199X", "Gentle Madman" and "I believe" along with the battle BGMs "Keeper of Lust", "Blooming Villain" and "Victory."

Victory will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set
description:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 4 Golden.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs: "Backside of the TV", "Game", "Junes Theme", "Heaven" and "Long Way" along with the battle BGMs "Revelations: Mitsuo", "The Almighty" and "Results."

Results will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: NoName
description: NONAME is a strategy, puzzle battler with tons of tactics to win once and for all. We invite you to enter a unique game world that requires logic and wits!

name: Endless Wonder VR
description: Endless Wonder VR is a colorful VR platformer in which you will need to use unique sticks with unique abilities that can be combined in any way to complete a campaign consisting of various levels with a unique stylized environment, enemies and obstacles.

name: Empyre: Earls of the Deep Earth
description: It's the time before the Flood. The world is a strange place. Especially for you. How do you solve the mystery of your missing memory? Are you trapped? Can you leave? Ever? Enjoy a Neo-Victorian version of the Orient! Embark on a journey to explore a wondrous land filled with mystery and intrigue!

name: Divine Journey 2: The Five Books of Moses
description: Embark on an immersive journey through the foundational stories of the Bible in "The Five Books of Moses," the captivating sequel to Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus. Explore the epic tales of these ancient texts, encountering miracles, laws, and the divine guidance that shaped a nation.

name: Conquering Ciros
description: Conquering Ciros is an action rogue like with a dash of strategy. You play as Nilvor, a reborn lich learning about what happened to his kingdom and his place in this new world. Fight off hordes of enemies while unlocking new crystals, synergies, and upgrades. Regain what is rightfully yours.

name: Warped Continuity
description: The game incorporates the mechanics of the famous "slider" puzzle. The character is on one screen, and the player must move the screens around and move the character between screens to get to the door.

name: Wrath of the Roothless
description: Wrath of the Roothless is a 2d melee roguelike, where you play as jacob wielding his trusty Drumstick and Trashcan Lid to fight your way through hordes of monsters. Fight your way through to exact revenge and teach those monsters a lesson!

name: Adventure and Study English in a Fantasy World
description: The key to mastering English lies in your vocabulary.Insufficient vocabulary is the biggest obstacle to progress in reading, speaking, and writing.Let's change the way we learn and play the "Adventure and study English in a fantasy world" series!Learn for yourself and fight to save the world!

name: Little Cities: Bigger!
description: Little Cities: Bigger! reimagines classic city building from the ground-up for VR - with a cozy colourful twist!

name: Cat & Onion
description: A warm and whimsical cat adventure game where you climb, talk, fly and smack your way to places where no cat has ever gone before! Go on a short yet cosmic journey packed with curious characters, imaginative environments and good vibes.

name: Tribes 3: Rivals
description: Tribes 3: Rivals resurrects the high-speed, aerial combat of this legendary shooter franchise, for a fresh yet familiar FPS experience. In this fast-paced team shooter, you’ll ski, jetpack, battle, and race to capture the enemy team’s flag, all while ferociously defending your own. Choose from unique classes to customize your abilities, perks, and weapon loadouts, while playing across epic terrains from snow covered peaks to haunting deserts. Emphasizing teamwork, tactics, speed, and intense combat, Tribes 3: Rivals offers both nostalgic fans and newcomers an exhilarating FPS experience in this rebirth of the world’s fastest team shooter.

name: The Witch and the Bottle of Concept
description: The meat pigeon game of Demon City, with meta elements, allows you to experience the joy of breaking the fourth wall, a refreshing sense of strike, and difficult battles. Do you want to challenge the thrill of harmless clearance?

name: Contra: Operation Galuga
description: The legendary Contra series is back! Contra: Operation Galuga is a modern reimagining of the classic run-‘n’-gun action game from the ’80s, featuring modern graphics and sound. Encounter new stages, new play mechanics, an updated weapons system and explosive co-op combat for up to two players in Story Mode or four players in Arcade Mode.

name: Match It Sexy
description: Embark on a captivating gem-matching adventure! Win the hearts of three charming ladies through strategic gameplay. Unlock stunning animations as rewards. Enjoy High Quality renders and animations.

name: Hotel Renovator: Five Star Edition
description: The Hotel Renovator Five Star Edition includes the base game and a pack of 7 DLC to be released in the upcoming months. Expand your inner designer experience with 7 packs featuring amazing decoration items that will make your hotel stand out from the rest.

name: Death Trick: Double Blind
description: The star magician of Morgan’s Traveling Circus has vanished, but the show must go on! Death Trick: Double Blind is a non-linear detective game where an unlikely duo must gather clues, question suspects, and reveal contradictions to unravel the mystery of the missing magician!

name: No Love Lost
description: A luscious planet with a coveted resource. A booming black market that pays generously. Weigh the risks and watch your back in a battle between two raider crews. With Blending elements of PvPvE and competitive questing, No Love Lost takes you on a dangerous adventure at every turn!

name: Dragon Island
description: Henry Heimlich, a shark dragon lifesaver suddenly received a ticket to Dragon Island, the famous resort. Follow Henry to the island, and create some unique memory on the long shore with 6 other dragons!

name: ElbmarKs
description: A tribute to the magnificent side-scrolling Arcade shoot’-em-up games with a modern look, physics-based movement, and some challenging twists that will test your speed, reflexes, accuracy, patience, and memory at the same time.

name: Dino Mercs
description: DINO MERCS is a roguelike deckbuilding game where you take on the role of a veteran member of Dark Solar Defense, a shadowy private military corporation. To survive, build multiple decks while conducting operations, engaging in fierce combat, and defending your base from attackers.

name: Tomb of Pharaohs
description: Collect keys to unlock the "Pharaohs Tomb" and fight his remains to pass the level! Dodge traps, scorpions and mummies in a procedurally generated maze!

name: Subterrain: Mines of Titan
description: An uncompromising turn-based survival RPG set on Titan. After discovering your stasis pod, a doomed mining camp needs your help to survive the evolving horrors that lurk below. Research and craft equipment, fight against odds, and discover your destiny.

name: Mars After Midnight
description: A Playdate game by the Indie developer Lucas Pope, known for games such as Return of the Obra Dinn and Papers Please

name: Goblin Stone
description: Overadventuring has wiped out 90% of the goblins in the wild. Lead these goblins in a desperate struggle to reverse their fate through this turn-based RPG crafted in charming hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Passing By: A Tailwind Journey
description:
Set in a beautiful and whimsical world of floating isles and a never-ceasing west wind, Passing By - A Tailwind Journey allows you to embark on a memorable voyage as Curly, a young balloonist, who is tasked with delivering a mysterious letter.

In this genre hybrid of 2D puzzle platformer, survival game and adventure, you can explore the world at your own leisure, travelling from island to island by balloon ship and solving various puzzles while having to manage your resources in order to survive. An exciting adventure full of wholesome encounters and meaningful experiences awaits you!

name: Nazareno Runner Semana Santa
description: Nazareno Runner it's a game based on the Spanish version of Easter week where you have to make your character run across the city in order to get in time to your brotherhood. Help citizens along the way, make them follow you, avoid pits in the road as well as angry by-passers and drones. Get coins to unlock extra characters, extras and blessings. This humoristic game aims to join people in these holidays with respect and without a religious bias. Get your toasts ready and make your character go as far as possible!

name: The Birdcage 3
description: The Birdcage 3 is the sequel to The Birdcage and The Birdcage 2. As with the first two games, you need to solve a series of puzzles in each chapter in order to open the cage and free the bird.

name: World of Deadliest Catch: 2024 Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Funny Business
description:
Wow! It's your first day at your new job at the Funny Business joke factory. Over the course of a short corporate induction, you too can become a comedy genius!!

Of course, who knows more about comedy (and the teaching thereof) than junior manager Stone Jones~

name: Bomb Finger
description: Tap to defuse the bombs as they ignite faster and faster.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scions of Ithelia
description:
Prove your strength to Malacath and defend a demiplane of Oblivion in the Scions of Ithelia dungeon DLC.

Two Challenging Dungeons

Venture into two 4-player PvE dungeons, Oathsworn Pit and Bedlam Veil, coming soon to both the Crown Store and ESO Plus memberships.

Oathsworn Pit

A training ground for Malacath's chosen now lies soaked with the blood of the faithful, and the God of Curses demands you enact revenge on behalf of the fallen.

Bedlam Veil

Cultists have invaded the Bedlam Veil, located within the demiplane of Maelstrom. It’s up to you to defend this ancient vault and the mysterious relic it protects.

Rewards for the Worthy

Survive both dungeons to unlock unique rewards, including new item sets, collectibles, achievements, and more not found anywhere else in Tamriel.

name: Recursion
description: A first-person point and click adventure set in a strange facility. Solve puzzles, read strategically placed notes, press buttons, potentially die, and hopefully escape the worst Monday you’ve had in at least a week.

name: Pizza Tower: The Noise Update
description: The long-awaited Noise Update is finally here! Bringing you The Noise in all his glory in the form of a pseudo New Game+, revisiting the events of Pizza Tower through the eyes of the yellow gremlin, with perhaps a few twists along the way.

name: Finger Soccer League
description: Finger Soccer League is a 3D soccer game using bottle caps as players. It features offline turn-based matches against AI or friends

name: Angel Legion: Charming Mystery - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Event Race: Easter Tracks
description: The DLC, "Easter Table" introduces three new egg-citing tracks, and unlocks the two exciting and thrilling game modes; Keep Up and Last One Out.

name: Cyber Story
description: CyberStory, an immersive cyberbullying intervention game, empowers players with effective coping strategies in a digital world. Navigate challenging scenarios, gain insights, and enhance coping skills through engaging challenges. A safe, supportive environment for building resilience.

name: Shadows of Forbidden Gods: The Horrors Beneath
description: This DLC adds an entire new map layer, under the existing lands, with Dwarves, a new Evil race and a new giant god-thing. Grow your horrific creature across the map, assisted by two new agents and new ways to expand your orcs and Deep Ones.

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Founder's Pack
description: Experience the perks of being a Founding member of the Iron Orchestra! Secure your Founder's Pack to support the revolution and instantly unlock exclusive items. You'll get instant access to skins, weapon wraps, NOVA, attachments, emotes, executions and holograms, including the new Zoran skin Magma.

name: EnGaCho: Dreamy Butterfly
description: The path changes depending on player's choices! "EnGaCho" is an arcade-style side-scrolling action game where you advance while defeating enemies and earning money.

name: Vail: Enigmia Pack
description: Join the REYAB Corporation as a mercenary and stand out with the Enigmia Skin pack. Suit up in a sleek new character outfit and build out your arsenal with exclusive weapon skins.

name: Monster Shooter
description: Monster Shooter is a 3rd person point-based shooter in which you are humanity's last hope to protect your military base and the resources collected on the planet Hoperium against the Roncospheres. Take control and defend every part of the facility. Humanity depends on you!

name: Scribble
description: Feel like a real designer and follow this strange but friendly character in this 2D, monochromatic adventure. In a fun game with fluid movement and simple, responsive controls. Venture between vertical and horizontal platforms, avoiding traps and cliffs.

name: Minimal Escape
description: Is the dark world you travel simply a little nightmare, or our future to come?

name: Evader
description: Move white square with the arrow keys on your keyboard to dodge red squares.

name: English Tracing Book
description: English Tracing Book - help a child learn to draw letters and the alphabet.

name: Exanimum: The Silent Call
description: "Exanimum: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Steel Giants
description: The new MASSIVE challenge is waiting! Grab your hammer and get ready to dismantle the new colossi in Steel Giants DLC!

name: Reversi Temple
description: Reversi Temple is a wonderful strategy board game suitable for all ages. Listen to the in-game LoFi music whilst and let it run whilst you study making moves when you need a break. Be able to create your own custom board, such as creating a 3,600 tiled board and play for hours.

name: Search All: Mouses
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mice in a large location. The mice will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements

name: Cats of the Ming Dynasty
description: Explore the ancient city of Suzhou during the Ming Dynasty and find the delightful cats!

name: Jusfaslex
description: JUSFASLEX is a short kinetic visual novel about a dreamy boy who strives to create a society in a different dimension while struggling to connect to others.

name: Refrega
description: Real-time strategy, build bases, defend territories, and win battles. Command your troops with cunning and act swiftly to dominate the battlefield. Challenge players in the pursuit of strategic supremacy!

name: My Shadow
description: Explore the enigmatic world of My Shadow, a 2.5D Horror Puzzle Platformer where reality blurs. As night descends, illusions materialize, luring you into the intricate depths of your own mind. Unravel the mysteries where the boundaries of reality haze and imagination takes control.

name: Paradiso Series Bundle
description: Descend into the nightmare of Paradiso in melessthanthree's action-RPGs Lucah: Born of a Dream and Death of a Wish!

name: True Backrooms
description: The most accurate depiction of the backrooms.

name: Yumpgril
description: Take on the challenge of Yumpgril, a brutally difficult precision platformer. Climb, jump and fall your way through increasingly difficult locations. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

name: Project 13: Taxidermy Trails
description: Project 13: Taxidermy Trails, a Walking Simulator set in a mesmerizing Taxidermy Museum. In this immersive experience, you assume the role of an kidnapped Probant forced to find a way to escape. Complete all 13 Walks to get out of this Nightmare.

name: Honor of Nations
description: Honor of Nations delivers unmatched MMORPG experience in mobile platforms. Honor of Nations mobile captures the essence of classic MMORPGs, offering a vast, open world filled with quests, dungeons, and a rich lore. Immerse yourself in epic adventures, all within the convenience of your mobile device. Whether you're commuting, waiting in line, or just relaxing at home, your journey in Honor of Nations is always just a tap away.

name: RoboSync
description: RoboSync is a puzzle game where you will need to use logical reasoning and precision to complete the challenges. Release and lock passages at the right time to synchronize your robots' movements and achieve perfect synchronization to release all the locks at the same time.

name: Nobody Sleeps Tonight
description: A co-op survival horror about finding your friend who disappears at night in a strange forest hiding a sinister secret.

name: The Road of Heroes
description: A game for rapidly shaping heroes, featuring randomized equipment attributes and combat maps. After leveling up, you can customize attribute enhancements and learn skills of your choice, with the goal of defeating bosses upon entering combat.

name: Suramon
description: Enjoy a new life in Suramon, a land home to slime monsters. Explore an open world, grow your farm, capture slime, & save the day.

name: Saving Mrs. Hinako
description: In this visual novel by Studio Pork, make a strong-willed yet acquiescent, pure-hearted but rebellious housewife fall in love with you!

name: Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation
description: Will you mend your heart or be lost forever in a Vixen filled dungeon of lust and pleasure?

name: Piece Link
description: Connect the shapes to fit them together!

name: Slender: The Silent Call
description: "Slender: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself lost in a dark and menacing forest, confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets. Based on character by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudson

name: Paragon Pioneers 2
description: Paragon Pioneers 2 is a city-building idle game in which you discover, conquer and then build on islands to fulfill the needs of your inhabitants. Even with limited time to play you can enjoy this deep simulation game and follow one of the countless ways to optimize your empire.

name: Nuke Them All
description: An RTS classic reborn with a twist. Time is of the essence, Commander! Capture the flags, conquer the territories, and eliminate the enemy fort. And finally, nuke them all! This old-school sci-fi Indie real time strategy game, crafted by a devoted fan, revives the genre's enduring allure.

name: From Ashes, Bloom
description: A minimalist sandbox toy about rewilding Earth by destroying humanity as a mesmerizing alien creature.

name: Corrupted
description: A hardcore auto battle rogue-like deck-building (H.A.R.D) game, "Corrupted" has the strategy of an auto-battler and the challenging difficulty of a rogue-like. Build your own team and skill card deck, and retake the stolen spaceship through strategic placement and real-time card use!

name: Bunny Game
description: A multiplayer social deduction game for up to 12 players. Bunnies stock up for winter, while traitors plan mischief. Better watch your back!

name: Death of a Wish
description:
Death of a Wish is a vicious action-RPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people.

Play as Christian, a Marked child raised by a cult and struggling to escape indoctrination, as he bands with others to challenge their oppressors. By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths: Father, Sister, Cardinal, and Priest, they will upend the order of the world.

Rend your foes asunder with magical combos called Arias in a demanding combat system that emphasizes tactical aggression. Enhance your abilities with powerful perks that significantly alter your approach to battle and the rhythm of combat. With a limitless array of ways to fight stylishly, build your character your way to destroy your foes.

Christian’s Corruption will constantly rise throughout his journey, pulling him towards a tragic end. He can hold back the Corruption by achieving high ranks in combat and performing long, graceful combos. Only by mastering battle and fighting with true elegance will he stand a chance against the Nightmares.

Explore a bleak dreamworld filled with surreal new characters, encounters, and stories. The theocratic city of Neo-Sanctum sets the stage for a struggle to determine the shape of society, and the fates of Christian and his companions. Delve into the secret underworld of the esoteric and abandoned to meet new allies who will aid you on your journey.

Christian’s world is rendered with a visual style like no other. Battles come to life in an animated spectacle of blood, light, and motion. Nicolo Telesca’s chilling score mixes electronic sounds with live instrumentation to unite the game with tense anxiety and crackling catharsis.

name: Antipaint
description: A fast-paced paint 'em up roguelike where each level you beat becomes a masterpiece to add to your colorful collection.

name: CTRL Phreak
description: CTRL Phreak is an over-the-top hacking sim. Become a LEET H4X0R as you download RAM, fight elite hacker bosses, and "code" by literally mashing your keyboard. Welcome to the Deep Web, kiddo.

name: Chinese Empire
description: Chinese Empire is an economic city-building strategy taking place in the picturesque areas of China. Create your own new empire that will go down in history!

name: Rebel Transmute
description: Set on a living planet, Rebel Transmute is a sprawling metroidvania with fully customizable combat and platforming. Explore a vibrant ecosystem, befriend sentient robots, and fight the colonizers standing between you and your missing mother!

name: Gloomy Detective and Devil Girl
description: 15 year old Haruta Ichihara conducts a ritual to summon the demon girl Lyrae, not seeking her services or power, but desiring for his soul to be consumed. However, instead of complying, Lyrae proposes assistance to Haruta—not through soul consumption, but by unraveling the murder he’s been accused of.

name: Anima De Machina
description:
The world, so cruel, cares not for your mind
Although you've traveled far
But when lost, look at the sky and find
A guiding northern star

name: La Gran Alameda
description:
La Gran Alameda is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in the middle of a city under an otherworldly red sky. Make your way out of the facility and bring the fight to the rooftops! The city is completely infested, so watch out for fire coming from every direction.
This is not like the other bimonthly demon invasions though... This time they've brought some backup

name: Spediteur
description: Spediteur is a turn-based freight business strategy game. Plan the most profitable routes to win, but watch out for traffic jams and sabotage.

name: UDLR_Modify
description:
To reach your goal, you must change yourself.

This game can be difficult, but the difficulty curve dips down every time a new mechanic is introduced. If you get stuck, don't be afraid to skip ahead - there is no penalty for doing so! Progress is saved as long as you have third-party cookies enabled.

name: Hentai Stars: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rotrex
description: Sin descripción

name: Soulmaze
description: Get confused and have fun! Take control of two characters simultaneously and independently through many mazes making them find each other as fast as possible! Soulmaze is inspired in the belief in soul mates that challenges the ambidexterity and motor coordination of the player!

name: Block Magic Puzzle
description: Block Magic Puzzle is a classic game with a 10x10 play style.

name: Help Police: Pull the Pins
description: Help Police: Pull the Pins is a game featuring a familiar, popular, simple, and accessible puzzle game with a variety of difficulty levels.

name: Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Aniversary Edition
description: Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Anniversary Edition features Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire, 9 different deck styles, and supports mouse, keyboard, and gamepads. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever.

name: Trash Horror Collection 4
description: This collection includes 5 games and a story mode that will bring you the vibes of 80s trash films.

name: Majo Archive
description: There are girls called Majyo(witches) in the world, and this is the story happened between them. The main method of play is 2D Barrage Combat (STG). You can control Majyos to move around and defeat enemies.

name: Block Connector
description: You are the block and now you have to connect the colourful blocks to defeat your enemy, the polyhedron.

name: Jungle Ranger
description: The storyline is clear and easy to understand, and can interact with multiple NPCs. The gameplay is easy to learn and suitable for leisure and relaxation.

name: Hearthkeeper
description: Hearthkeeper is a fantasy colony simulator, with rpg and platformer elements. Your characters will require food, water and shelter as the seasons change and the world turns. Plant crops, build structures, defend against raiders and beasts, research technologies and much more.

name: Count Pumpcula
description: Embark on an exciting 2D-Metroidvania journey through the Eastern Archipelago of Lanthir Range! Along the way you’ll need to save the Sagelings from a dark curse in the forest of Orn, fight prehistoric creatures that were thought to be extinct, escape the beasts that lie within the Isle of Orad, and slide through the icy catacombs of Krakens Pass. In your down time, relax with charming new companions on the enchanting Island of Travellers Cove.

name: IIslands of War
description: IIslands of War is a 2D roguelike where you build and battle floating islands in the sky. Travel through different realms to various locations to collect powerful items or battle against enemies.

name: 9 Days
description: You have 9 days before the final fight. At your current state, you do not stand a chance! Explore this Open World to gain new skills and abilities for the battle. Choose where you go, what you do carefully. You cannot waste time! You have 9 days.

name: Gas Station Simulator and Can Touch This DLC Bundle
description:
Gas Station Simulator
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory. Get rid of debris and broken furniture, fix up the walls, paint and decorate the place to your liking. Just don’t spend all your cash on the looks right away, you bought a gas station after all. Repair the equipment, buy what can’t be repaired and start serving your customers to earn money for further renovations and improvements.

Gas Station Simulator - Can Touch This DLC
Get some new tools and redecorate your gas station. Change walls, doors, windows and move things around. Make your own art and rival Dennis’ artworks. Want to change the warehouse or the workshop? Now you can. And much, much more.

Olympian legends — including Hades and the thunder god Zeus — now rule the Island in otherworldly rage. To make matters worse, they’ve brought their powers and weapons with them. name: Phenom Overdrive

Dozens of defense towers, multiple skills and a large number of battle cards are the key to survive from endless zombies! Good luck!

name: Skill Up!

name: Per Aspera Test

name: Endless Ascent
description: It begins with you waking up in a strange basement after a tranquilizer has been shot, you realize you've been taken hostage. Now, you must escape! Ascend your way out of the mess through a variety of puzzles and avoid traps to ensure your survival.

name: Bubble Fresh Fruits

name: Knights & Guns: GOTY Edition

name: 13 Seconds
description: [13 Seconds] is a hardcore bullet hell roguelike game.Use both hands to control two robots at the same time and fight your way through a barrage of bullets and death rays from merciless machines of destruction!Will you be able to reach the ultimate level 13?

name: WWE 2K24

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix - Complete Edition
description:
No track is too big, no racer too small!

Join your favorite PAW Patrol pups, and up-to 4 players at once, in their fastest paced adventure yet! Including every track from the original game and all the PUPtastic features from the DLC packs - RACE IN BARKINGBURG and PUP TREAT ARENA!

name: Kanau
description:
Prequel to "Karamu".

On the eve of his tenth birthday, Rakuo Kumode undergoes his family’s “initiation rite.” When he bucks against his family traditions, he has an encounter that will change the course of his life forever.

name: Unicorn Overlord: Monarch Edition
description:
From the masterminds that brought 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim, Odin Sphere, and Dragon's Crown, ATLUS x Vanillaware presents the rebirth of tactical fantasy RPG. Fight against fate and embark on a royal adventure to regain your reign alongside trustworthy allies.

Unicorn Overlord combines the timeless tactical RPG genre with overworld exploration and innovative battle system for a unique epic fantasy experience in the iconic Vanillaware style.

name: VR Houses: Glass Apartment
description: VR Houses: Glass Apartment is a groundbreaking experience where photorealism takes center stage. Step beyond the borders of traditional VR games and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic digital environment.

name: Bums
description: Bums is a game with a great variety of mini games where funny and scary. Go through them together with your friends or against them, all to win. The entrance to these worlds lies through cassettes, which are hidden all over the map, and some of them are unique and only a few will be able to find them

name: Dawnsbury Days
description: Lead a group of childhood friends through their first adventures in a turn-based tactical RPG played under the rules of PF2E, the second edition of a powerful OGL ruleset. Customize their builds, acquire loot and level up, and ultimately defeat the sinister enemies who threaten your hometown.

name: Auto Auto: Maximum Autodrive In The Alien Apocalypse
description: Oh no! Aliens have taken over! All of humanity is a hive mind with one goal... to destroy the last person standing! Drive, drift, and shoot your way through the onslaught before the aliens decide to deal with their little problem themselves. How long will your spirit keep the last person alive?

name: Guardians of Eden
description: "Guardians of Eden": a tower defense cultivation game where you serve Valkyries, meeting their needs, and showcase strategic skills in battles by placing them strategically and allocating resources for success.

name: Movie Cinema Simulator
description: Build the most successful cinema business in the world!

name: There's No Easter Eggs
description: There's no Easter eggs is a casual hidden object game with over 500 Easter eggs to find.

name: Alchemy Origin
description: Alchemy: Origins is a classic alchemy game that starts you with 4 basic elements and allows to connect them to create more and more elaborate items - all the way to reaching the stars.

name: Xatrom Command
description: Team up and shoot down waves of invading aliens. Single player or multiplayer top-down shooting action

name: Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition
description:
Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Outer Box
- Artbook (132 pages)
- 16-bit Arranged Music Album
- Card game (239 cards, players: 2-4, play time: 30-120 minutes)
- DLC Voucher (ATLUS x Vanillaware Heraldry Pack)

name: Farmer Survivors
description: Welcome to Farmer Survivors, where you'll embark on an epic rural adventure, defending your farm against hordes of hungry insects in this action-packed Arcade Survivor game!

name: One More Hound!
description: Bit your top-scores in this wave-combat game!!

name: Go Go Zombies
description:
Rage and rampage as a fast zombie mob!
First, they killed you. Then, they brought you back. Now you're loose and it's time for some sweet, sweet, blood-soaked payback! Kill 'em, baby! Kill 'em all!
Just click where you want the zombies to go, and the ones in range will attack nearby enemies automatically.

name: ProxOS
description: Step into a time portal to 1993. While your friends are battling it out in the latest FPS adventures, you got the opportunity to learn the newest trend, programming. Turn on your CRT monitor and learn to write code, compete with others in challenges or write minigames.

name: Summerhouse
description: A tiny building game about beautiful lived-in houses. No rules or restrictions, just pure creativity.

name: Candles
description: Candles is a top-down, atmospheric horror game where you collect candles scattered throughout a house to perform a sealing ritual on a demon before it gets to you first. Explore the house, find the candles, solve puzzles, and outmanoeuvre the demon to escape.

name: Human Farm: Pratice Section
description: Human Farm - Pratice Section is a "milking-specialized exploration escape game" developed by Tokkuri Kurage! Find a way to escape from this farm where women are treated like cows!

name: King of the Bridge
description: Face off against the bridge troll in his bizarre game of chess! Decrypt, Twist and Enforce the rules as your devious opponent attempts to break them in King of the Bridge!

name: Stilt
description: A VR platformer with unique movement, inspired by classic platformers. Arm yourself with stilts and use your quick reflexes and problem-solving skills to succeed in single player adventure or PvP multiplayer.

name: Backpack Battles
description: The inventory management auto battler! Buy rare and legendary items to build powerful setups. Then battle other players with it.

name: Zombie Forest 3: Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Bore Blasters
description: Blast through rocks with your machine gun drill. Collect rare gems, ores and ancient artifacts, upgrade your ship and unlock new abilities. Uncover the mysteries of the deep and the dangers that lurk below.

name: Clash: Blue Mirage
description: Save the day with Clash!

name: Lost With You
description: Lost With You is a survival game with a visual novel added to it. You must use all available resources to survive on a deserted island, and also maintain good relations with your companion.

name: Touhou: Red Empress Devil
description:
Touhou: Red Empress Devil is a bullet-hell shooting roguelike action game.
Set in The Scarlet Devil Mansion, the inhabitants of Gensoukyou go on a rampage!

name: Synthwave Glider
description: Synthwave Glider lets you blast through an abstract world inspired by the 80s, have fun as you chase after your friends high score!

name: Deterrence
description:
Artificial intelligence has plotted a path to a sustainable future, but humans aren't included. Defend humanity against the A.I. in this instant action tower defense, real-time strategy hybrid.

Deterrence is a tower defense, real-time strategy hybrid that offers a midcore single-player experience. Play as the human race in the not-too-distant future and fight malfunctioning artificial intelligence. Choose your own conflicts in the nonlinear campaign that's complete with mission rewards and research tree.

Each level is a puzzle to solve using strategy. Depending on your skill level, you will have to play an active role in helping your troops withstand the enemy onslaught whether that be repairing defenses, reallocating troops to another front, designating artillery strike zones, or destroying bridges.

Command your troops to victory by taking advantage of everything the battlefield has to offer. Garrison troops in civilian structures for quick defense. Build artillery batteries to pound enemy advances. Jam the enemy signals to gain an advantage. Call in air strikes, artillery strikes, and warheads to turn the tide of battle.

name: Magic Chaos
description: "MAGIC CHAOS" is an online multiplayer bullet-hell shooting party game for up to 4 players. Customize your own unique combination of diverse characters and strategic skills to win the seriously chaotic battle royale!

name: A War of a Madman's Making
description: You are subordinate to a deranged dictator and must plan his doomed invasion in this text-based RPG / Visual Novel. Navigate the shark-filled waters of the Great Leader's presidential cabinet, and try to save your family and survive the purges in a world of power-hungry leaders and nuclear warfare.

name: Tales of Morrow
description: Create your tale! Build, fight, farm, and explore in this relaxing yet adventurous experience. You decide your fate!

name: Where is the Meaning?
description: Where is the Meaning? is a JRPG where the action takes place in an unknown universe. The player will have to make conclusions regarding what has happened here. You are the geometric figure which needs to reach the end of this world.

name: Durdanto
description: DurDanto is a roguevania like pixel art platformer game where you play as Zubok in a fallen city with beautiful pixel art environments while facing different enemies. Use elemental abilities to uncover secrets of the fallen city & solve environmental puzzles to unlock game levels!

name: Little Lives
description: Little Lives is a life-sim game. Balance your time between your career, education and relationships as you explore the town of Littleton.

name: Roses of Love
description:
A new stage begins. The trip to a new city, meeting new friends and enjoying a good read. Yukiko manages to enter the prestigious Aoi Academy for young ladies and here she will meet her future partner.

Yukiko will share her day to day life with her friends and every day will seem unique in her eyes. From working in a cafeteria, to reading romance novels in a quiet place at the academy.

"Welcome to Aoi Ladies' Academy."

name: Stolen Realm
description: Turn based strategy meets action RPG in this dungeon crawling looter. Venture forth alone or with friends through online co-op. Conquer as a single champion or with a party of up to 6. Master deep and satisfying, tactical combat. Recover the Stolen Realm.

name: Greebles
description: Networked multiplayer action game for Mac OS Classic. Players fight each other or cooperate while killing all the Greebles in each stage to advance.

name: Unicorn Overlord
description:
From the masterminds that brought 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim and Odin Sphere, ATLUS x Vanillaware presents the rebirth of tactical fantasy RPG. Fight against fate and embark on a royal adventure to regain your reign alongside trustworthy allies.

Unicorn Overlord combines the timeless tactical RPG genre with overworld exploration and innovative battle system for a unique epic fantasy experience in the iconic Vanillaware style.

Traverse a vibrant world, assemble units and direct them into exquisitely animated battles. Perform heroic deeds and grow renown throughout the five nations. Cultivate a grand army with over 60 unique characters, from humans and elves to massive beasts and heavenly angels
